name: Sp00py Game
description:
Sp00py Game is a retro-arcade style game. You play as a simple skeleton man trying to defend the world from an invasion of evil ghosts. If you let them reach the surface world, you lose!

Sp00py Game isn't anything fancy. It was a way of proving to myself that I could create something and see it through.

While I feel as though I've produced a fairly complete product, I have some features I would like to add in the future:

  • Power Ups
  • More Music
  • Bosses
  • Skins
  • More Background
  • Special Pumpkins

This is my first real foray into game development, so I would appreciate as much constructive criticism as possible!

Join the Studio 110 Games Discord: https://discord.gg/CNATvwn
